attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned want for the government to ban all advertising in magazines - on and offline and promoting cosmetic surgery on television through makeover shows,  and published articles giving "column inches" that cosmetic surgery is a solution that promotes a happier way of life and will make the person more confident. plastic surgery should be for those who have been checked with the back up of medical advisors and psychiatrists and signed off as essential life support - rather than conceit or unsatisfied with natural which is non life threatening.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
